author: Simon Difford
description: My attempt at mimicking the taste of a Krispy Kreme Original Glazed doughnut without ending up with an overly sweet cocktail.
name: Doughnut Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Licor 43 (or other spiced vanilla liqueur)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
